name: my-bot
author: Kevin Novak
description: A discord.js bot template written with TypeScript

scripts.build: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npm run typesafe-i18n && npm run build-types && tsc --project tsconfig.json
scripts.commands:view: npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/start-bot.js commands view
scripts.commands:register: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/start-bot.js commands register
scripts.commands:rename: npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/start-bot.js commands rename
scripts.commands:delete: npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/start-bot.js commands delete
scripts.commands:clear: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/start-bot.js commands clear
scripts.start:bot: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/start-bot.js
scripts.start:manager: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/start-manager.js
scripts.start:prod: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npm run build && npm run commands:clear-prod && npm run commands:register-prod && npm run start:manager-prod
scripts.start:pm2: npm run build && npm run pm2:start
scripts.build-prod: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npm run replace-i18n-types && npm run build-types && tsc --project tsconfig.json
